body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer service. My name is Gregory Richardson and I represent ABC Car Dealership. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, Gregory. My name is Rose Bennett.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Rose. Can you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it is five five five, two two one, four eight nine seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Rose. And may I also have your email address for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's rose dot bennett at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Rose. We will look into the quality issue you have experienced.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I hope it can be resolved quickly. I am quite angry about it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your frustration, Rose. We will do our best to address the issue promptly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for taking the time to speak with me today, Rose. We appreciate your feedback.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Have a great day and feel free to reach out if you need further assistance. Goodbye.
